entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who is discussing his future with Zabini and others. He mentions that he doesn't think completing his education is important because the Dark Lord will not care about qualifications.

entities.name: zabini
entities.description: Zabini is a student at Hogwarts who is scathingly asking Malfoy if he thinks he'll be able to do something for the Dark Lord.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is a student at Hogwarts who is sitting with his mouth open in awe of Malfoy.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is a student at Hogwarts who is sitting with his mouth open in awe of Malfoy.

entities.name: pansy
entities.description: Pansy is a student at Hogwarts who is gazing down at Malfoy as though she has never seen anything so awe-inspiring.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is the school that Malfoy and his friends attend.

relationships.description: Malfoy and Zabini are having a conversation about their future.
Crabbe is in awe of Malfoy's confidence and ambition.
Goyle is also in awe of Malfoy's confidence and ambition.
Pansy is admiring Malfoy as though she has never seen anything so awe-inspiring.
Malfoy attends Hogwarts, the school he is discussing with his friends.
